Yes and no

You play the game
You write a comment here if is not working
First time I use maxi image... where do I get the mds file?

"You use SDHide"
Whats that and how do i get it?

The ".mds" include in the .RAR
No "polemic" but Maxi or Mini Image can be named the ".mds" 

We call this the Maxi Image because is include the Total Image or the Original CD (Without modification) 

The rar is very slow to unpack (unrar) for this reason 
495 KB > 3 921 760 KB 
For space allocation on disk
Then You Need SD4Hide to hide Deamon Tools

Cobra Kai: 

To play a game with SafeDisk protection you need to have the original CD/DVD or a tool (Deamon Tool) to mount a copy (image) of this CD/DVD
Medieval 2 use SafeDisc 4.60.000, and this version 4.6x use a algorithm to detect any Tool to Mount a image without the original CD/DVD, This method is called blacklisting
This Tool can be found on thepiratebay with search tool, with Google or forum like GameCopyWorld

Is very simple to find
Try http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3422017/SD4hide
